item.title: The Right’s Trump Derangement Syndrome
item.description: They keep pretending the president is someone he’s not.

item.title: South Korean Court Orders Impeached President’s Release From Jail
item.description: President Yoon Suk Yeol was not immediately freed, and the ruling does not affect the insurrection charges he faces for declaring martial law.

item.title: Trump’s Foreign Policy May Be Crude, But It’s Realist
